dublin_core.dcvalue: SIJARIEMAS is a system that utilizes SMS and phone calls to initiate and manage the referral process for obstetric and newborn emergencies. Upon identification of an emergency case, a health-center based midwife sends an SMS with patient data, vital signs and diagnosis to the system. The system automatically routes the information to the nearest hospital, where an alarm is activated to prepare staff for the arrival of the emergency case.
